label: 町会所積み金
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 4:  Early Modern Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1991
見出し読み: まちかいしょつみきん
見出し読み_mod: まちかいしょつみきん
説明文: Reserve fund [constituted by money collected from each person who owned land, the amount of which is determined by the value of his land] that ward representatives used to buy and store rice for emergencies, to make grants to elderly persons who lived alone, and to finance low-interest loans for the construction and maintenance of homes and shops (p. 592).
